information.author: Centreon
information.changelog: * New export with comment on services template

description.value:
Plugin pack to monitor IBM Informix DBMS using SQL request.
Several indicators are available but not linked to the template of host.
You have to use them manually:
* Archivelevel0-Generic-Name
* Archivelevel0-Global
* Checkpoints
* Chunk-Down-Global
* Connection
* Dbspace-Usage-Generic-Name
* Dbspace-Usage-Global
* Global-Cache
* Lockoverflow
*  Logfiles-Usage
* Longtxs
* Sessions
*  Table-Locks-Generic-Name
* Table-Locks-Global

Pack Plugin pour surveiller les SGBD IBM Informix en utilisant des requêtes SQL.
De nombreux indicateurs sont disponibles mais ne sont pas associés au modèle d\'hôte.
Ils doivent être déployés manuellement :
* Archivelevel0-Generic-Name
* Archivelevel0-Global
* Checkpoints
* Chunk-Down-Global
* Connection
* Dbspace-Usage-Generic-Name
* Dbspace-Usage-Global
* Global-Cache
* Lockoverflow
*  Logfiles-Usage
* Longtxs
* Sessions
*  Table-Locks-Generic-Name
* Table-Locks-Global

information.monitoring_procedure:
# Monitoring procedure ## Prerequisites ### Centreon Plugin Install this plugin on each needed poller: # yum install ces-plugins-Applications-Databases-Informix ## Informix Client SDK: Go to download "Informix Client Software Development Kit for Linux x86\_64, 64-bit" (clientsdk.3.50.FC9.LINUX.tar) on IBM website. Install with the following procedure:: 1. Copy archive on the poller 2. Create an user informix useradd informix chmod 775 /home/informix 3. Need to install Sun JRE 1.6.x 4. Install SDK (choose Typical Installation):: ./installclientsdk -javahome /usr/java/jre1.6.0\_45/ .... Please specify a directory or press Enter to accept the default directory. Directory Name: [/root/informix/sdkclient/] /home/informix/sdkclient ### Perl DBD Informix To compile DBD Informix, you need an access to an Informix Database, run: # cd /usr/local/src # wget http://search.cpan.org/CPAN/authors/id/J/JO/JOHNL/DBD-Informix-2013.0521.tar.gz # tar xzf DBD-Informix-2013.0521.tar.gz # cd DBD-Informix-2013.0521 # export INFORMIXDIR=/home/informix/sdkclient # export LD\_LIBRARY\_PATH=$ORACLE\_HOME/lib # export PATH=${PATH}:/home/informix/sdkclient/bin # export LD\_LIBRARY\_PATH=/home/informix/sdkclient/lib/esql/:/home/informix/sdkclient/lib/ # export DBD\_INFORMIX\_USERNAME=root # export DBD\_INFORMIX\_PASSWORD=xxxx # export DBD\_INFORMIX\_DATABASE=xxxx Set Informix Instance in "/home/informix/sdkclient/etc/sqlhosts" file: INSTANCE onsoctcp IP PORT Compile the library: $ perl Makefile.PL $ make Then install it: $ make install Then create the file : /etc/ld.so.conf.d/informix.conf and link to the Informix Library: $ touch /etc/ld.so.conf.d/informix.conf vi /etc/ld.so.conf.d/informix.conf You just have to enter in the file: /home/informix/sdkclient/lib/esql/ /home/informix/sdkclient/lib/ Then: /sbin/ldconfig ### user account The safest way to retrieve information from the Oracle server is to create a dedicated user for Centreon. This user account must have the read permission on "sysmaster" database. ## Centreon Configuration ### Create a new Informix server Go to *Configuration > Hosts* and click *Add*. Then, fill the form as shown by the following table:
Field Value

Host name

Name of the host

Alias

Host description

IP

Host IP Address

Monitored from

Monitoring Poller to use

Host Multiple Templates

App-DB-Informix-custom

Relations > Parent Hostgroups tab
Click on the *Save* button.
information.name: Informix DB

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les sessions courantes.} {EN: Check current sessions.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Sessions

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le nombre de transactions longues courantes.} {EN: Check number of current long transactions.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Longtxs

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier le nombre de fois qu'Informix a dépassé le nombre de "locks".} {EN: Check the number of times Informix attempted to exceed the maximum number of locks.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Lockoverflow

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les caches de lecture et écriture.} {EN: Check read/write caches.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Global-Cache

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la connexions au serveur Informix.} {EN: Check connection to the Informix server.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Connection

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier si des "chunks" sont "offline".} {EN: Check if "chunks" are "offline".}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Chunk-Down-Global

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les "checkpoints".} {EN: Check Informix Checkpoints.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Checkpoints

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'ensemble des sauvegardes des "dbspaces".} {EN: Check archive level0 backup last execution.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Archivelevel0-Global

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation d'un "dbspaces".} {EN: Check a dbspace usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Dbspace-Usage-Generic-Name

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les différents "locks" sur les tables d'une base de données.} {EN: Check table locks on one database.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Table-Locks-Generic-Name

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des "dbspaces".} {EN: Check some dbspaces usage.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Dbspace-Usage-Global

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier l'utilisation des fichiers de logs Informix.} {EN: Check usage for log files.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Logfiles-Usage

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier la sauvegardes d'un "dbspace".} {EN: Check archive level0 backup last execution.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Archivelevel0-Generic-Name

service_templates._comment: {FR: Contrôle permettant de vérifier les différents "locks" sur les tables.} {EN: Check table locks.}
service_templates.name: App-DB-Informix-Table-Locks-Global
